answers.answer: I don't know if it's different with GD but docs will only let you go 2 weeks overdue. They will try and induce you a couple of times after 40 weeks but baby will definitely be out by 42 weeks :)
You'll have to ask our doc. I asked mine. She gets them out "some how, some way" between 40 and 41 weeks.

question: I'm 38 weeks and I have GD. I'm wondering how long doctors let you be pregnant before they chose to induce.
title: gestational diabetes
